title: HOUR 1 - Rams-Bengals, Stafford, Burrow
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Rams-Bengals, Stafford, Burrow
description:
Colin talks about the Rams Super Bowl victory over the Bengals

Matt Stafford proves where you get drafted matters

Stop complaining about the officiating

The Bengals will have a difficult season next year


Guest: Shannon Sharpe
